title: Enhancing photocatalytic tetracycline degradation through the fabrication of high surface area CeO2 from a cerium–organic framework
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17507-17518
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02640C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ayla Roberta Borges Serra, Gabriel Castro de Sousa, Viviane de Carvalho Gomes, Idio Alves de Sousa Filho, Cesar Koppe Grisolia, Baiwen Zhao, Richard I. Walton, Osvaldo Antonio Serra
Water pollution is a global environmental issue, and the presence of pharmaceutical compounds, such as tetracyclines (TCs), in aquatic ecosystems has raised growing concerns due to the potential risks to both the environment and human health.
